content.body: is there any index of (IDL-defined) APIs such that I could look for "HTMLDocument#xmlStandalone" and find where it is defined, if anywhere? ideally also including inheritance/mixins?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: is there any index of (IDL-defined) APIs such that I could look for "HTMLDocument#xmlStandalone" and find where it is defined, if anywhere? ideally also including inheritance/mixins?

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: Sam Sneddon [:gsnedders]: it's removed: https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#dom-document-xmlstandalone
Sam Sneddon [:gsnedders]: it's removed: https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#dom-document-xmlstandalone

content.body:
> <@annevk:matrix.org> Sam Sneddon [:gsnedders]: it's removed: https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#dom-document-xmlstandalone

I specifically mean "where is there a global index" and just used that as an example, rather than that case specifically
